para.text: (BYOR) example shows how you can use Vulcan Datatypes
The example does NOT come with the Vulcan Runtime DLLs. You need to have these installed
on your machine and you may need to update the references
to the Vulcan Runtime DLLs on your machine.
// Please read the comments in Readme.txt !
// This method is needed if you want to use the Macro Compiler or the RDD system
